cslibrary.cslibraryitems

Class DevBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cslibrary.cslibraryitems.CSLibraryItem
      • cslibrary.cslibraryitems.DevBoard

  • public class DevBoard
extends CSLibraryItem
    dev board is a CS library item containing information needed for a CS library's records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DevBoard

        public DevBoard(java.lang.String nameIn,
                java.lang.String ratingIn)
        New dev board's will set their name and difficulty rating.
        Parameters:
        nameIn - Name of the dev board. Null names will be set to "Unnamed".
        ratingIn - Difficulty rating of the dev board. Valid ratings are "Beginner", "Intermediate", "Advanced", and "Expert". Any other provided difficulty rating will be set to "Unknown".

    • Method Detail

      • setDifficultyRating

        public void setDifficultyRating(java.lang.String difficultyRatingIn)
        Set the difficulty rating of the dev board.
        Parameters:
        difficultyRatingIn - Difficulty rating of the dev board. Valid ratings are "Beginner", "Intermediate", "Advanced", and "Expert". Any other provided difficulty rating will be set to "Unknown".

      • getDifficultyRating

        public java.lang.String getDifficultyRating()
        Returns the dev board's difficulty rating.
        Returns:
        The dev board's difficulty rating

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        String representation of a dev board. Returned String is of the form:

        NAME

        Status: AVAILABILITY

        Loan: LOAN_PERIOD weeks

        Age Recommendation: AGE_GROUP

        Difficulty rating: DIFFICULTY_RATING

        Where NAME is the name of the dev board, AVAILABLITY is either "Unavailable" or "Available", LOAN_PERIOD is the number of weeks the item can be checked out, AGE_GROUP is the recommended age group for the dev board, and DIFFICULTY_RATING is the difficulty rating of the dev board.

        Overrides:
        toString in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        String of the dev board.

      • alphabetizeBy

        public java.lang.String alphabetizeBy()
        dev boards are alphabetized by name.
        Specified by:
        alphabetizeBy in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        The name of the dev board.

      • ageRecommendation

        public java.lang.String ageRecommendation()
        Returns the recommended age group for the dev board. Dev board age group recommendations are as follows:

        "Beginner": AGE_GROUP_ONE

        "Intermediate": AGE_GROUP_TWO

        "Advanced": AGE_GROUP_THREE

        "Expert": AGE_GROUP_FOUR

        Based upon the difficulty rating, returns the appropriate age recommendation. If the difficulty rating is unknown, returns "No Recommendation".

        Specified by:
        ageRecommendation in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        The dev board's recommended age group.

      • loanPeriod

        public int loanPeriod()
        dev boards may be checked out for one week.
        Specified by:
        loanPeriod in class CSLibraryItem
        Returns:
        Number of weeks the dev board can be on loan.
